item.title: 317 ~ [Delta] - Beginner Tutorials - [Delta] ~ 317
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“rova1, post:28, topic:359569”] if(objectID == 4878){ addItem(995, 100000); sM("You steal 100k coins!"); }

Used this tut to make this, instead of random item I made it coins.
No errors compiling, but when I click the object I get no item and no message.
What is wrong?[/quote]

Well,

  1. Maybe you put it in the wrong spot? What method did you put it under???
  2. You used the wrong object id

VERY MOST LIKELY #1, tell me what method you put it in

item.title: 317 ~ [Delta] - Beginner Tutorials - [Delta] ~ 317
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:16, topic:359569”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=456014.msg3350074#msg3350074 date=1285203196]
Your conventions are still horrible, fix them. Also I would try to explain your code a little bit more.
[/quote]

Can you quote an example where my conventions are bad[/quote]

if(UsedOnObjectID == #### && ItemID == ****){ // item id used on object
deleteItem(****, %); // deletes item
addItem(&&&&, %); // adds item
}

I’m pretty sure it’s supposed to have tabs before the deleteItem and addItem methods.

Read full topic

Your conventions are still horrible, fix them. Also I would try to explain your code a little bit more.
[/quote]

Can you quote an example where my conventions are bad[/quote]
Here’s one of many…

public static int Box[]

Conventions state: “…first letter lowercase, with the first letter of each internal word capitalized.”

public static int box[]

item.title: 317 ~ [Delta] - Beginner Tutorials - [Delta] ~ 317
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

x sam x:

Firstly the cannon, the reason you cant tell us how to make the cannon long ranged is because its not even ranging weapon, so to make it ranged you would have to make it a ranging weapon. secondly, this is very badly explained and i wouldn’t know how to follow it if i was using this guide.

Firstly, the cannon is long ranged on my server and if you weren’t a total complete IDIOT you would know that you can make it long ranged with the right coding, and just because I said WON’T doesn’t mean I don’t know how to make it long ranged, it just means I won’t tell you.

Secondly I agree it is badly explained for beginner and thats why I changed the title, and this only reason you can’t follow this is because your an idiot.

Btw, thanks for the feedback

Read full topic
